titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to extend the treatment currently afforded to Federal judges under the Federal Employees Group Life Insurance Program to certain other judicial officials.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee in the Nature of a Substitute.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service. H. Rept. 103-855.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 472.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 10/7/1994--Reported to House amended. Amends Federal civil service law to extend the treatment currently afforded to Federal judges under the Federal Employees Group Life Insurance Program to certain other judicial officials.
